021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.config.MainConfig;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.utils.HandlerResponse;
024
025/**
026 * EntityDropItemHandler
027 *
028 * @author creatorfromhell
029 * @since 0.1.2.0
030 */
031public class EntityDropItemHandler {
032
033  public HandlerResponse handle(final String material) {
034
035    //This only matters if the config is enabled.
036    if(MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Server.MobDrop") &&
037       TNECore.eco().currency().findCurrencyByMaterial(material).isPresent()) {
038
039      return new HandlerResponse("Can't do that starfox.", true);
040    }
041    return new HandlerResponse("Sure.", false);
042  }
043}
